name: le_js_full
description: This is the full starting application (with image gallery) for the final chapter of [*Learn Enough JavaScript to Be Dangerous*](https://www.learnenough.com/javascript-tutorial) by Michael Hartl, based on the sample application developed in [*Learn Enough CSS & Layout to Be Dangerous*](https://www.learnenough.com/css-and-layout-tutorial) by Lee Donahoe and Michael Hartl.
